en.ms: Quaff thou, the immortalising Nectar of the Guru 's Word.
en.ssk: Taste the ambrosial essence, the Word of the Guru's Shabad.

es.sn: y saborea el Néctar de la Palabra del Shabd del Guru.

hi.ss: (हे भाई !) गुरू के शबद का आनंद ले। (गुरू का शबद) आत्मिक जीवन देने वाला रस है।
hi.sts: हे प्राणी ! गुरु का शब्द अमृत रस है और इस अमृत रस का पान कर।

en.ssk: Of what use are other efforts?

en.bdb: Showing His Mercy, the Lord Himself protects our honor. ||2||

en.bdb: What is the human? What power does he have?
en.ms: What is man? says, what power he has?
en.ssk: What is the human? What power does he have?
